decimals.description: Display decimal points for token amount. Must be 0 for NFTs

description.description: General notes, abstracts, or summaries about the contents of an asset.

minter.description: The tz address responsible for minting the asset.

creators.description: The primary person, people, or organization(s) responsible for creating the intellectual content of the asset.

contributors.description: The person, people, or organization(s) that have made substantial creative contributions to the asset.

publishers.description: The person, people, or organization(s) primarily responsible for distributing or making the asset available to others in its present form.

date.description: A date associated with the creation or availability of the asset.

blockLevel.description: Chain block level associated with the creation or availability of the asset.

type.description: A broad definition of the type of content of the asset.

tags.description: A list of tags that describe the subject or content of the asset.

genres.description: A list of genres that describe the subject or content of the asset.

language.description: The language of the intellectual content of the asset as defined in RFC 1776.

identifier.description: A string or number used to uniquely identify the asset. Ex. URL, URN, UUID, ISBN, etc.

rights.description: A statement about the asset rights.

rightUri.description: Links to a statement of rights.

displayUri.description: A URI to an image of the asset. Used for display purposes.

thumbnailUri.description: A URI to an image of the asset for wallets and client applications to have a scaled down image to present to end-users. Reccomened maximum size of 350x350px.

externalUri.description: A URI with additional information about the subject or content of the asset.

isTransferable.description: All tokens will be transferable by default to allow end-users to send them to other end-users. However, this field exists to serve in special cases where owners will not be able to transfer the token.

isBooleanAmount.description: Describes whether an account can have an amount of exactly 0 or 1. (The purpose of this field is for wallets to determine whether or not to display balance information and an amount field when transferring.)

shouldPreferSymbol.description: Allows wallets to decide whether or not a symbol should be displayed in place of a name.

attributes.description: Custom attributes about the subject or content of the asset.

assets.description: Facilitates the description of collections and other types of resources that contain multiple assets.

uri.description: A URI to the asset represented in this format.

hash.description: A checksum hash of the content of the asset in this format.

fileSize.description: Size in bytes of the content of the asset in this format.

fileName.description: Filename for the asset in this format. For display purposes.

duration.description: Time duration of the content of the asset in this format.

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the content of the asset in this format.

dataRate.description: Data rate which the content of the asset in this format was captured at.

type.description: Type of the value. To be used for display purposes.
